html: 3.27.21  7:30 pm    how do i get things done?
3.27.21  6:25 pm   what is your opinion on being alive?

3.27.21  5:03 pm   do you find it important to have videos of yourself in your music videos?

     i always love seeing them, so i was wondering if there was a reason you included them
3.27.21  4:14 pm   Why is there always some kind of music in your videos?
3.27.21  3:55 pm   When asked which of your songs is your favorite, you say you would prefer to make a new one your favorite. Do you think you've accomplished making each song better than the last?

3.27.21  2:37 pm   in your song "Mount St. Helens is about to Blow Up" when the mountain begins singing, is that like a metaphor for it blowing up?

     Because i noticed while it was singing it was starting to become a little more distorted until eventually it was flatter than before. was that your intention, or was it just a coincidence?

3.27.21  1:53 pm   have you ever considered releasing an album?

     if yes, what are the (dis)advantages and why are singles better or not?
3.27.21  1:11 pm   hey, i have recently tried to start writing songs... in garageband, and i have no idea how to, can you show what i would need to do to train?
3.27.21  11:46 am   hey bill. i can't find out how to make my music sound like it's coming out of a tv in the 50s. any ideas?
3.27.21  11:02 am   what inspired you to write songs
3.27.21  7:55 am   hey bill how do i incorporate key changes into my songs? writing in one key seems a little stiff and boring and id like to move forward but i dont know how to

3.27.21  4:38 am   here comes the sun comes after im a princes on your song section please fix that

3.26.21  11:52 pm   on a scale of one to ten how accurate is the video making process described in "slow down"?
3.26.21  11:39 pm   I want to be a musician, writer, or just something creative like that, but I don't feel like I have anything worth saying. What do I do?
3.26.21  11:18 pm   So "i'm a princess" get's me wondering... does this have anything to do with completing your songs and how far you have gotten in your career?
3.26.21  10:26 pm   tips for writing bass parts?
3.26.21  9:06 pm   What does "i'm a princess" say about your gender identity?

3.26.21  8:30 pm   What inspired you for the lyrics, "Mmm, buckets."? It's so beautiful, so incredibly thoughtful.

      The meaning behind it is so deep.

     What could have possibly made you think of it?

      Have you been thinking day and night, brainstorming for how deep this could go.

      Lyrics so incomprehensibly great shouldn't exist.
3.26.21  7:59 pm   Are you the kind of person who finds constraints to be useful for causing creativity?
3.26.21  7:28 pm   mr. wurtz why are you good at music-ing
3.26.21  7:27 pm   i want to write things but the problem is, i don't really like the act of writing itself. how do i overcome this?
3.26.21  6:54 pm   is the line "all the soldiers that surround me and make sure i'm lonely" a reference to some kind of princess-related trope
3.26.21  5:24 pm   when was im a princess written?

3.26.21  5:21 pm   one of the things ive done recently in my videos is, since I couldn't get an object to animate along with my musical phrase the right way, I just changed the musical phrase to go along with the animation. have you considered and/or done this before?
3.26.21  4:59 pm   Do you think your songwriting method (e.g. music and lyrics at the same time) is the one that's best in general, or can/should everyone do it the way that works for them?

3.26.21  12:55 pm   Did you learn animating or music first, or at the same time?
3.26.21  12:37 pm   It is my opinion that "At the airport terminal" is one of your best songs. How did you manage to capture the feeling of being at the airport so perfectly

3.26.21  12:25 pm   hey bill. you said you get a trillion ideas to do something, but get disappointed when none of them are possible so you just do something you can instead. i get the same thing, i can clearly imagine what i want or could do with media, but i dont have to knowledge to execute it, so i never try something in the first place, how do i cross this barrier in my motivation?
3.26.21  12:11 pm   Whats your favorite part of the new animation style you are using?

3.26.21  5:57 am   do you feel like you hold yourself to higher standards than others,

      and if so do you ever wish you could stop doing so

3.26.21  3:45 am   Im getting time anxiety, i just turned 20 and im kinda getting desperate, you know, people and stuff that you like and even love, they're aging and there's gonna be day where it will all disappear. Time, you know? It goes by so fast and it gives me so much anxiety. Do you have any advice to help me deal with this? Thank you.
3.26.21  2:52 am   How does one come to terms with missing out on so many great opportunities in life?

3.26.21  2:35 am   Sometimes when I'm reading your questions page I forget that I'm reading your questions page. Then I read the answer to a question and I think "hey that sounds like bill wurtz" because the answer is so incredibly bill wurtz that it reminds me of you. Furthermore, your last two songs have felt more "normal" but in a way that is so immensely bill wurtz that it might not even be "normal" at all. How do you remain so intensely bill wurtz?
3.26.21  2:22 am   Does your new song contain monkeys?
